title: Kona Grill uses WordPress theme created by Fanatic Design
statement: Kona Grill's website uses a WordPress theme called 'Kona Grill 2025' created by Fanatic Design.

citations.quote:
Theme Name: Kona Grill 2025
Theme URI: https://fanatic.co.uk/
Author: Fanatic Design
